name: Camie
text: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to 1 of your {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Leader or Character cards. Then, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

effect.text: You may rest this Character: Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to 1 of your {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Leader or Character cards. Then, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.
